                            Caption ="Info Only  NEXT_EX:"
                            GUID = Begin
                                0xed864f703cd69e4ab217ebe21a0a8563
                            End
                            LayoutCachedLeft =7200
                            LayoutCachedTop =2940
                            LayoutCachedWidth =8865
                            LayoutCachedHeight =3180
                        End
                    End
                End

                        "ll be removed from Categories, JudgeTypeCategories and JudgeTypes tables.\015\012"

                        "e 'pencil' icon for the JCAT row.    3. Repeat as necessary.\015\012   Notes: - "
                        "Changing an Existing JCAT may invoke a 'Write Conflict' message (field changed b"
                        "y another user). This is due to the cascade update\015\012                    in"
                        " the reference between JudgeTypes.JCAT and JudgeTypeCategories.JCAT. If you get "
                        "the messsage - Click [Save Record]\015\012               - To abort non entered "
                        "entries, press the keyboard [Esc] key.\015\012- To ADD A NEW JCAT:   1. Enter th"
                        "e JCAT value in the next empty row.  2. Click the 'pencil' icon.  3. Proceed wit"
                        "h other Edits as above.\015\012- To DELETE A JCAT:  1. Only if there are two or "
                        "more JCATs listed for the National Categroy.  2. Highlight the row.  \015\012   "
                        "  3. Right Click the row and selet 'Cut' or press the keyboard [Delete].\015\012"
                        "\015\012"

CodeBehindForm
Attribute VB_GlobalNameSpace = False
Attribute VB_Creatable = True
Attribute VB_PredeclaredId = True
Attribute VB_Exposed = False
'    SciFairMaster.mdb  (All class objects and modules)
'
'    Copyright (C) 2001,2002,2003,2004,2005,2006,2007,2008,2009,2010,2011,2012,2013,
'                  2014  Dennis e.Spanogle
'
'    This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
'    it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
'    the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
'    (at your option) any later version.
'
'    This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
'    but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
'    MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
'    GNU General Public License for more details.
'
'    You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
'    along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
Option Compare Database
Option Explicit
Private msg As String
Private Title As String
Private tNCAT As String

Private Sub Form_AfterInsert()
  ' just added a new category so...  add a record to JudgeTypeCategories and Judge Types
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Dim rsJTC As Recordset
  Dim rsJT As Recordset
  Set rsJTC = CurrentDb().OpenRecordset("Select * from JudgeTypeCategories", dbOpenDynaset)
  Set rsJT = CurrentDb().OpenRecordset("Select * from JudgeTypes", dbOpenDynaset)
  rsJT.AddNew
    rsJT!JCAT = NCAT
    rsJT![JCAT NAME] = CATNAME
  rsJT.Update
  rsJTC.AddNew
    rsJTC!NCAT = NCAT
    rsJTC!JCAT = NCAT
  rsJTC.Update

  Me.Refresh
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description

End Sub

Private Sub Form_Delete(Cancel As Integer)
   ' not work if user has turned off the warning messages.
   On Error GoTo SubError
   ' First confirm  before delete NCAT must clear all table with NCAT
   '  i.e. set NCAT = NULL and JCATs = null and delete records in Judetypecategorie
   '    and in Judgetypes.. and set ncat = null in SpecialWinners table
   '  if exhibits exist will have to reset jcat and ncat and sort and renumber
   '  if JCAT in judges will have to reset JCAT from other P_1 P_2 etc.
   If MsgBox("This will Do a Complete Delete of " & NCAT & " and all associated JCATs!" & vbCrLf & _
             "Deletes the Categories table record for " & NCAT & vbCrLf & _
             "Deletes records in JudgeTypeCategories and JudgeTypes for " & NCAT & vbCrLf & _
             "Sets NCAT = null and JCAT = Null everywhere NCAT " & NCAT & " is set or an associated JCAT is set" & vbCrLf & _
             "You can do it anytime but - Best to do this ONLY after Fair Maintenance!    " & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
             "ARE YOU REALLY SURE?     " _
             , vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, "Delete Category") = vbNo Then
      Cancel = True
      Exit Sub
   End If
   '
   '  If this NCAT exists  in Judgetype categories
     ' for Each JCAT with this NCAT in JudgetypeCateories
     '   Clear null JCAT in ExhibitData records
     '    Clear null the NCAT in Exhibit data record
     '   Clear null  JCAT in Judges Table
     '   Clear null  JCAT in P_! -> P_4 in Judges Table... so now can
     '   Delete the record in the Judgetypes table
     '   Delete the record in the JudgetypeCategories Table
     '  next record
   '   If this NCAT exists in any SPECIAL Winners table records
      '   Clear NCAT in Specila winners table
   ' Now can proceed with the delete questions for the Category Tables.
     '  If this NCAT exists  in Judgetype categories
     Dim rsJTC As Recordset
     Dim rsJT  As Recordset
     Dim rsJud As Recordset
     Dim rsExh As Recordset
     Dim rsSW As Recordset
     Dim curNCAT As String
     curNCAT = NCAT
     Set rsJTC = CurrentDb().OpenRecordset("Select * from JudgeTypeCategories " & _
          "WHERE NCAT = '" & curNCAT & "'", dbOpenDynaset)
     ' for Each JCAT with this NCAT in JudgetypeCateories
     Set rsJT = CurrentDb().OpenRecordset("Select * from JudgeTypes ", dbOpenDynaset)
     Set rsJud = CurrentDb().OpenRecordset("Select * from Judges ", dbOpenDynaset)
     Set rsExh = CurrentDb().OpenRecordset("Select * from ExhibitData", dbOpenDynaset)
     Set rsSW = CurrentDb().OpenRecordset("Select * from SpecialWinners", dbOpenDynaset)
     If Not rsJTC.EOF Then   ' loop thru JudgeTypeCategories
       Do While Not rsJTC.EOF
         If Not rsExh.BOF Then rsExh.MoveFirst
         If Not rsJud.BOF Then rsJud.MoveFirst
         If Not rsJT.BOF Then rsJT.MoveFirst
         If Not rsSW.BOF Then rsSW.MoveFirst
          '    Clear null JCAT in ExhibitData records
          '    Clear null the NCAT in Exhibit data record
         Do While Not rsExh.EOF
           If rsExh!JCAT = rsJTC!JCAT Then
             rsExh.Edit
             rsExh!JCAT = Null
             rsExh!NCAT = Null
             rsExh.Update
           End If
           rsExh.MoveNext
         Loop
     '   Clear null  JCAT in Judges Table
     '   Clear null  JCAT in P_! -> P_4 in Judges Table... so now can
         Do While Not rsJud.EOF
           With rsJud
           If !JCAT = rsJTC!JCAT Then
             .Edit
             !JCAT = Null
             .Update
          End If
          If !JCAT = rsJTC!JCAT Then
            .Edit
            !JCAT = Null
            .Update
          End If
          If !P_1 = rsJTC!JCAT Then
            .Edit
            !P_1 = Null
            .Update
          End If
          If !P_2 = rsJTC!JCAT Then
            .Edit
            !P_2 = Null
            .Update
          End If
          If !P_3 = rsJTC!JCAT Then
            .Edit
            !P_3 = Null
            .Update
          End If
          If !P_4 = rsJTC!JCAT Then
            .Edit
            !P_4 = Null
            .Update
          End If
          End With
          rsJud.MoveNext
         Loop
    '  null the occurances in Special Winners Table
         Do While Not rsSW.EOF
          If rsSW!NCAT = rsJTC!NCAT Then
             rsSW.Edit
             rsSW!NCAT = Null
             rsSW.Update
          End If
          rsSW.MoveNext
         Loop
         ' now delete the record in the JudgeTypeCategories
         Dim holdJC As String
         holdJC = rsJTC!JCAT
         rsJTC.Delete   '  delete the current JudgeTypeCategory record
         'Then delet the record in the JudgeTypes table
         Do While Not rsJT.EOF
          If rsJT!JCAT = holdJC Then
             rsJT.Delete
          End If
          rsJT.MoveNext
         Loop
         '  next record in judgetypecategories if any
         '  note this will give an error if no records left
         On Error GoTo DoMore
          rsJTC.MoveNext
        Loop
     End If   '  There are no records in the JudgeTypeCategories table
DoMore:
   On Error GoTo SubError
   ' Now can proceed with the delete questions for the Category Tables.
   MsgBox "All NCAT and JCAT values for " & NCAT & " have been set Null" & vbCrLf & _
          "All records in JudgeTypeCategories and JudgeTypes for " & NCAT & " deleted!" & vbCrLf & _
          "Only the Categories record remains at this time!" & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
          "NOTE: YOU MUST select YES in the next dialog box!"
   Exit Sub
SubError:
          MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_BeforeDelConfirm(Cancel As Integer, Response As Integer)
   ' the record in Categories has been deleted at this point
   ' but will be replace if error or if say do not delete
    On Error GoTo SubError
   ' we are here BEFORE the message OK to Delete
   If Response = 2 Then
      
   End If
 
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_AfterDelConfirm(STATUS As Integer)
  ' Use this to delete other related records (i.e. Persons) BUT,
  ' You must do :me.Application.SetOption "Confirm RecordChanges",True
  '   Or this Routine is NEVER CALLED!
  On Error GoTo SubError
  If STATUS <> 2 Then
     Call ScifairLog("Del Category NCAT: ", 0, " " & tNCAT)
     Exit Sub   ' user denied the deletion
  End If
  ' if status = 0 then the delete was done
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Close()
   On Error GoTo SubError
   ' Close Any Needed Recordsets  Edit This
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Open(Cancel As Integer)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  ' Add any Code Required prior to Form showing on Screen Edit This
  Title = "Edit Categories"
  Me.Rev.Caption = RevisionDate 'In Functions
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub NCAT_AfterUpdate()
   On Error GoTo SubError
   Call ScifairLog("Chg Categories NCAT: ", 0, Me.NCAT.OldValue & _
                    " --> " & Me.NCAT)
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
